rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" find . -type f -exec touch -t 200001010000.01 '{}' ';'
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir .mybin
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then ln -s $BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-gcc .mybin/gcc ln -s $BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ld .mybin/ld ln -s $BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ranlib .mybin/ranlib ln -s $BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-as .mybin/as fi
rules.build:
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR:$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make PREFIX="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ PLATFORM=linux \ C_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION_OPTIONS="$CFLAGS $CPPFLAGS" \ VARDIR=/var/lib/
rules.install:
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR:$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make PREFIX="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ PLATFORM=linux \ LINKER_LINK_SHARED_DLOADABLE_OPTIONS="-L. -shared $LDFLAGS,-R'.'" \ LINKER_LINK_SHARED_PROGRAM_OPTIONS="$LDFLAGS,-R'.'" \ LIBCHICKEN_SO_LINKER_OPTIONS="$LDFLAGS,-soname,libchicken.so.11" \ VARDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/var/lib" install
rm -fr $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/chicken/doc
